title: leaverbuster perma ban?
body:
I just buyed project ekko and i dont want to lose my account now.
I already had 30 leaver buster.
I am 7 months further now.
Can i get a perma ban for keeping this sorta up?
What I mean with this is:
Sometimes get a leaverbuster, get it over with and then dont have 1 for 7 months.
If i keep up with this.
Can i get a perma ban?
Or
can you even get a perma ban with leaverbusters?

replies.body: The more you continue to have interruptions with your games, the more games you'll need to play to as well as wait in lower priority queue.  It's really important that you work towards resolving whatever is causing these leaves, as it causes very negative experiences for other players who are consistently down a player.  If you are having any issues that's preventing consistent play, I'm happy to try and help!
